name: "Unexpected Error" "The package is unavailable at the moment" Error Message
title: "Unexpected Error" "The package is unavailable at the moment" Error Message
body:
You may see an error similar to the image below when trying to access an email:

There are two possible causes for this error.

Opening an Older Email

If you open an old email, the link in the email will have been severed due to inactivity. If this is the case, please forward the email from your inbox to open@reader.egress.com to receive a new link. This action will send you an automated email containing a new link to access the email.

Opening a New Email

If the email is very recent, you will need to contact the sender, as it may not have been uploaded fully at their end, and they may need to resend the email. Sometimes, following the instructions above can also resolve this issue.

images.alt:
This image displays a system error screen, likely a web application interface, titled **"Unexpected Error"** in large, bold text.

**Content and Context:**

The central body text explains that **"The package is unavailable at the moment."** It provides specific troubleshooting instructions:

1.  **Immediate action:** Advise the user to wait a few seconds and click the 'Retry' button.
2.  **Previous Access:** Instructions to forward the email containing the `.switch` attachment to `open@reader.egress.com` to receive a new link.
3.  **First Access:** Instruction to contact the sender if this is the initial access attempt.

**Technical Metadata:**

A technical reference string is provided near the bottom:
**Ref: (kw02)/69.120.166.5/221019222939**

**UI Elements (Action Buttons):**

Two action buttons are located in the bottom right corner:

1.  **Retry:** A primary action button with a white background and dark border, containing a refresh icon followed by the text **"Retry."**
2.  **Back to home:** A secondary action button with a dark gray background and white text, containing a left chevron icon followed by the text **"Back to home."**
